fields.Name: Skip AssociationDB - Revenue Breakdown by Source
fields.Description: Tests Skip's ability to categorize revenue by source (memberships, events, courses) and show percentage distribution.

InputDefinition.userMessage: What percentage of our revenue comes from memberships, events, and courses? Show this as a pie chart with the breakdown. When I click on a slice, show me a table of the actual transactions in that category.

judgeValidationCriteria: Response includes a pie chart showing revenue distribution
Three main categories are shown: memberships, events, courses
Percentages add up to 100% (or close to it)
Each segment is clearly labeled with category and percentage/amount
Chart makes it easy to see which source generates most revenue
Clicking pie slice shows transaction/invoice list for that category
Transaction table allows opening individual invoice records
